name: Datacube Connection
description: Creates a connection to the datacube and queries for data
code:
# WDC Code Snippet: Create datacube connection and query data 
# Variables - change these values to refine your data selection:  
app_name = "your-app-name" 
product  = "sen2_l2a_gcp" 
lon_min  = -4.096 
lon_max  = -4.060 
lat_min  = 52.399 
lat_max  = 52.423 
time_min = "2024-06-01" 
time_max = "2024-06-30" 
output_crs = "epsg:27700"  

import datacube  
dc = datacube.Datacube(app=app_name) 
query = {"x": (lon_min, lon_max),
         "y": (lat_min, lat_max),
         "time": (time_min, time_max),
         "output_crs": output_crs,
         "resolution": (-10,10),
         "dask_chunks": {"y" : 2048, "x" : 2048}
        } 
dataset = dc.load(product=product, **query) 
dataset
